medical_history.chief_complaint: Bilateral corneal masses observed at admission to the orphanage.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The corneal opacities were noted upon admission to the orphanage in 2016. The infant presented with bilateral vascularized dome-shaped corneal tumors, larger on the right side. In June 2021, significant regression of both corneal dermoids was observed, particularly in the right corneal tumor.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diagnosis of Fetal Valproate Syndrome (FVSD) due to congenital anomalies resulting from maternal use of Valproic Acid during pregnancy.
